Access to Express Retrieval Only items

To access these materials, UA faculty, staff, students and affiliates can use express retrieval to request items and get them from the hold shelf in 24 hours. Just select the Request this item button.

To request a scanned copy of an article or chapter, submit a request for document delivery.

If you have questions or need immediate assistance, come to the Ask Us desk on the 2nd floor of the Health Sciences Library or call (520) 626-6125.
